overview: Soviet cartoon, created in 1979 by the director-animator Leonid Nosyrev. Later, he entered the cartoon almanac "Laughter and Grief at The White Sea"  with other Nosyrev's films based on Pomor fairy tales and legends.
cast: Yuri Volyntsev|Anatoliy Barantsev|Mariya Vinogradova|Kira Smirnova|Tatyana Vasileva
